channel.title: Help with client, not connecting to Source!
channel.description: I need help with my client, thats not connecting to the source. (Friend has my client on different computer, i portforwarded my computer, and have no-ip running, changed the ip in client to the no-ip, send him the client, and when he opens client, it wont load, why is that? Can someone help me! Please thank you! Also, we are looking for staff, so ide love if someone could help, and wants to join my server, ide love to bring you into our dev. team. Thanks help is needed!!

item.title: Help with client, not connecting to Source!
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

Did you update the IP in your client.java?

Read full topic
item.source: Help with client, not connecting to Source!
